SEARCH
Package no.ntnu.idatx1005.controller

Class SignUpViewController

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatx1005.controller.SignUpViewController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ButtonClickObserver
public class SignUpViewController extends Object implements ButtonClickObserver

SignUp View Controller

This class is responsible for handling the sign up view and the user registration. It implements the ButtonClickObserver interface.

Since:
V1.1.0
Author:
William Holtsdalen

    • handleSignUpButtonAction

      private void handleSignUpButtonAction()
      Handles the sign up button action. Verifies the credentials entered by the user, and if they are valid, it calls the handleSignUp method to add the user to the database. If the user is successfully added, it shows the login view, otherwise it displays an error message.

    • verifyCredentials

      private boolean verifyCredentials()
      Verifies the credentials entered by the user. If the credentials are valid, the method returns true, otherwise it returns false.
      Returns:
      true if the credentials are valid, false otherwise

    • handleSignUp

      private boolean handleSignUp()
      Handles the sign up action. Calls the appropriate method in DatabaseService to add the user to the database. If the user is successfully added, the methods returns true, otherwise it returns false.
      Returns:
      true if the user was successfully added, false otherwise
